    • 构造器详细资料

      • SavingAccount

        SavingAccount(java.lang.String firstName,
              java.lang.String lastName,
              int month,
              double interest_rate)
        This constructor initializes one instance of saving account.
        参数:
        firstName: - the first name of the owner
        lastName: - the last name of the owner
        interest_rate: - the interest rate of this type of saving account

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAccountType

        java.lang.String getAccountType()
        This method returns the account type.
        覆盖:
        getAccountType 在类中 Account
        返回:
        "saving"

      • getScheme

        java.lang.String getScheme()
        This method returns the saving scheme in the form of HTML.
        返回:
        saving scheme

      • deposit

        boolean deposit(double amount)
        You can invoke this method to deposit money. And because it is a saving account, every time the user operates, the money will grow according to the interest rate.
        覆盖:
        deposit 在类中 Account
        参数:
        amount: - the amount that will be deposited
        返回:
        result of depositing

      • withdraw

        void withdraw(double amount)
       throws OverdraftException
        You can invoke this method to withdraw money. And because it is a saving account, every time the user operates, the money will grow according to the interest rate.
        覆盖:
        withdraw 在类中 Account
        参数:
        amount: - the amount that will be withdrew
        抛出:
        OverdraftException - the balance is insufficient to afford the withdrew amount
